description: Jane is an LGBT parent who works at the marketing firm Bright Ideas Inc. and is an active member of the Rainbow Alliance community group.
relationship:
• Mark is Jane’s coworker at Bright Ideas Inc.; they often exchange parenting tips on Slack.
• Dr. Emily Stanton is the behavioral therapist treating Jane’s child and regularly updates Jane on progress.
• Lisa is a colleague and fellow Rainbow Alliance member who offers Jane community support.
